long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"SelectText.Exe" is an innovative Chrome extension tailored for scenarios where text is non-copyable, such as within code snippets or images and videos on the web. It empowers users to extract text effortlessly from these contexts, enhancing productivity and information accessibility.

The extension offers multiple functionalities including OCR (Optical Character Recognition) for extracting text from images and videos, enabling users to seamlessly interact with previously non-editable content. Moreover, "SelectText.Exe" provides a comprehensive feature to copy entire page text, ensuring convenient access to all textual content in one click.

Future updates will focus on improving accuracy and expanding compatibility with various web formats, reinforcing its utility as a versatile tool for extracting and manipulating text across diverse online content types.
